name: poll-api-nodejs
description: Poll API for final project of UNSJ

scripts.start:local: npm i && sls offline --aws-profile awsTesis --region us-east-1 --stage tesis
scripts.deploy: npm i && sls deploy --aws-profile awsTesis --region us-east-1 --stage tesis
scripts.package: npm i && sls package --aws-profile awsTesis --region us-east-1 --stage tesis

author: Matias Rodriguez
